Text: I am just keeping Slysoft products up to date.
Microsoft Security Essentials found a threat in the Game Jackal files... but otherwise, this tested clean for me...
Loaded without any hitch. Close Adaware before using keygen and patch.
Trend Micro finds TROJ_GEN.R44C3D2 in the GameJackal patch.
I am probably being dim, but how do I use the patches and regtools?  I have installed Clone CD, but do not know what to do with the regtool.  Help appreciated!
